data.message: She told me she was working at Facebook  Head Qarters as Service Reopresentativ, and reported that I had won a large sum of money December 22 by On-line Facebook International Pool Promo. Her boss was said to be Sheryl Sandberg COO for facebook.  Do you know this person ( and the COO ) ? You can find her picture and name on my Facebook-page.

replies.message: Hey Solveig. This sounds like a hoax. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/22NtiSI. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Jordan
